review_body: works great and silky smooth on my Pixel 2XL

Significant battery drain while idle. Could also use a map/pin drop feature for delivery location instead of entering a long address.   Also, it's not an app problem, but why would you stop delivering at 1:15 PM?
Super easy to get around and custom your food! What a game changer. The delievery drivers on bikes are super quick too. I love Happy + Hale!
